We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Presales Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Opebi, Ikeja - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We seek a highly skilled and motivated Presales Engineer and Security expert to join our dynamic team at Edgebase Technologies.
	The ideal candidate will possess deep technical knowledge of Digital Infrastructure, Networking and cybersecurity security solutions and with Ability to work closely with OEM&rsquo;s to design solution End-to-End for our customers.
	As a Presales Engineer, you will be responsible for solution architectures, proof of concepts (PoCs), and proof of value (PoV) and delivering technical expertise to prospective clients.
	This role is ideal for someone eager to take on technical sales, solution design, and customer engagement.
	This role requires a dynamic professional who can bridge the gap between technical expertise and business needs, supporting our sales team with solution design, technical presentations, and client engagement.


Responsibilities


	Provides pre-sales lead technical product demonstrations - proof of concept, demos, and workshops to prospective clients.
	Collaborates with sales teams, OEM&rsquo;s / vendors, and industry partners to understand client requirements and provide tailored IT solutions.
	Ability to respond to proposals RFP, RFQ to achieve edgebase global target.
	Create an architectural detailed design, engineering, and implementation specifications for networks and solutions by doing deal Reg.
	Deliver training and support to our Sales team and Engineers under the direction of the enterprise manager.
	Continuously learn and stay ahead of the industry and competitive solutions, products, and services by engaging in trainings and certifications
	Participate in product/service pitch meetings, bids, and technical defences with internal and external stakeholders.
	Provide pre and post-sales support in solution deployment to ensure client satisfaction and seamless onboarding.
	Work closely with enterprise manager, sales, and delivery teams to ensure successful customer outcomes.
	Maintain accurate Enterprise-sales forecasts and Edgebase Certification levels.
	Provide regular updates to the Enterprise managers on Certifications and trainings
	Maintain company IT standards, Architecture principles and Strategy, Roadmap and use cases.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree or higher in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, and related fields or equivalent experience.
	3-5 years of experience in a technical/pre-sales role with proven experience in a pre-sales or solution design role within the IT industry is key.
	Experience designing/engineering LAN/WAN, Data Center, Security, and creating BOMs, pricing strategies, and solution configuration.
	Strong knowledge of IT infrastructure, networking, cloud services, storage and enterprise solutions will be a great advantage.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
	Relevant certifications could include (e.g., MICROSOFT, CISCO, HPI &amp; HPE, DELL , LENOVO, FORTINET, SOPHOS, ETC ) will be an advantage.
	CNA/CCNP or any other industry security certification equivalent.
	Experience working with enterprise clients and customer engagement and opportunity Identification.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to:&nbsp;kola.afolabi@edgebasetech.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Presales Engineer Job at Edgebase Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Edgebase Technologies Limited is an ICT based company in Nigeria with an over 13 years continuous operations and provide ICT support and equipment to major institutions like Banks, Hotels and multinationals in Nigeria. The company is an approved Gold partner with Hewlett Packard (HP) Tier2 partner with Dell EMC and registered with all major IT based equipment manufacturers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Presales Engineer

Job Location: Opebi, Ikeja - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We seek a highly skilled and motivated Presales Engineer and Security expert to join our dynamic team at Edgebase Technologies.
	The ideal candidate will possess deep technical knowledge of Digital Infrastructure, Networking and cybersecurity security solutions and with Ability to work closely with OEM’s to design solution End-to-End for our customers.
	As a Presales Engineer, you will be responsible for solution architectures, proof of concepts (PoCs), and proof of value (PoV) and delivering technical expertise to prospective clients.
	This role is ideal for someone eager to take on technical sales, solution design, and customer engagement.
	This role requires a dynamic professional who can bridge the gap between technical expertise and business needs, supporting our sales team with solution design, technical presentations, and client engagement.


Responsibilities


	Provides pre-sales lead technical product demonstrations - proof of concept, demos, and workshops to prospective clients.
	Collaborates with sales teams, OEM’s / vendors, and industry partners to understand client requirements and provide tailored IT solutions.
	Ability to respond to proposals RFP, RFQ to achieve edgebase global target.
	Create an architectural detailed design, engineering, and implementation specifications for networks and solutions by doing deal Reg.
	Deliver training and support to our Sales team and Engineers under the direction of the enterprise manager.
	Continuously learn and stay ahead of the industry and competitive solutions, products, and services by engaging in trainings and certifications
	Participate in product/service pitch meetings, bids, and technical defences with internal and external stakeholders.
	Provide pre and post-sales support in solution deployment to ensure client satisfaction and seamless onboarding.
	Work closely with enterprise manager, sales, and delivery teams to ensure successful customer outcomes.
	Maintain accurate Enterprise-sales forecasts and Edgebase Certification levels.
	Provide regular updates to the Enterprise managers on Certifications and trainings
	Maintain company IT standards, Architecture principles and Strategy, Roadmap and use cases.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree or higher in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, and related fields or equivalent experience.
	3-5 years of experience in a technical/pre-sales role with proven experience in a pre-sales or solution design role within the IT industry is key.
	Experience designing/engineering LAN/WAN, Data Center, Security, and creating BOMs, pricing strategies, and solution configuration.
	Strong knowledge of IT infrastructure, networking, cloud services, storage and enterprise solutions will be a great advantage.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
	Relevant certifications could include (e.g., MICROSOFT, CISCO, HPI & HPE, DELL , LENOVO, FORTINET, SOPHOS, ETC ) will be an advantage.
	CNA/CCNP or any other industry security certification equivalent.
	Experience working with enterprise clients and customer engagement and opportunity Identification.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: kola.afolabi@edgebasetech.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only applicant that meet job specifications/requirements will be contacted.

Research Human Resource Business Partner Executive Job at the Concept Group




        
    

        
        The Concept Group is a holding company for companies established in 1992. Subsidiaries under the Group include: Rosabon Financial Services - Nigeria’s Leading Financial Intermediary and Equipment Leasing Company, Concept Nova - Bespoke Enterprise IT Solutions Company,Percy Aitkins - Bureau De Change.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Research Human Resource Business Partner Executive
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled Research Human Resource Business Partner Executive to support the Senior Research Human Resource Business Partner to drive a data-driven approach to talent management, blending behavioral science, organizational psychology, and workforce analytics.


Main Responsibilities


	Design and Curate Assessments: Identify, evaluate, and implement best-in-class psychometric, behavioral, and situational tests to measure key qualities such as Drive, Critical Thinking, Humility, and Emotional Intelligence.
	Talent Research and Validation: Support R-HRBP to test and validate assessments that predict high performance in our context.
	Data-Driven Hiring Strategy: Analyze assessment results and correlate them with KPIs, performance reviews, and retention outcomes to inform hiring decisions.
	Optimize Candidate Experience: Ensure testing is engaging, inclusive, and respectful of candidate time.
	Strategic HR Partnership: Advise managers and executives on evidence-based recruitment and talent development decisions.
	Continuous Innovation: Stay ahead of global trends in talent science, organizational psychology, and HR technology.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Development and implementation of a comprehensive talent assessment framework
	Validation of assessments against business outcomes (e.g., performance, retention)
	Improvement in hiring process efficiency and candidate experience
	Adoption of evidence-based recruitment and talent development practices across the organization
	Contribution to thought leadership in talent management and HR innovation


Requirements


	B.sc or Master's degree in HR, Organizational Psychology, Industrial-Organizational Psychology, Human Resources, or related fields
	No Hands-on experience with psychometric tools, SJTs, cognitive testing, or engagement measures is required
	Certification in talent assessment, psychometrics, or a related field is a added advantage
	Strategic thinker with ability to translate insights into practical solutions
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Collaborative mindset with ability to work with diverse stakeholders
	Passion for innovation and continuous learning


Salary
N15,000,000 - N20,000,000 / Annum.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: careers@conceptgroup-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
